title: Did any scientist reject his own discovery after being proven right? - Quora

response.answer_text: Einstein was not happy being associated with the Atomic Bomb. Even though it wasn’t his discovery, it is thought that his letter to FDR led to the creation of the Manhattan Project. Also Oppenheimer I believe deeply regretted heading the project creating the Atom Bomb. Referring to himself as the “Destroyer of Worlds”. I believe he was disgraced at the end of his career objecting to the creation of the Hydrogen Bomb.
